events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will begin our review soon.
Your profile has been categorized under the engineering cluster based on your skills in software development.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your application to guide you through the hiring process.
We successfully completed the initial screening, reviewing your developer experience and project portfolio.
Thank you for your prompt response to our screening questions and providing further clarification on your skills.
Your technical interview to discuss your software engineering expertise and problem-solving skills has been scheduled.
